com.soa.console.binding
Class BindingContextLoader

java.lang.Object
  com.soa.console.binding.BindingContextLoader

public class BindingContextLoader
extends java.lang.Object

The BindingContextLoader is used to retrieve and set binding context from the servlet request context.

Since:
6.0

Method Summary
